description: Creation of basement under North and South aisles, linked under nave, ground floor link between North-East vestry and lobby of tower, first floor link between North-East stair landing and tower. (Listed Building Consent application ref: P071485 also submitted)
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Prior to any excavation works commencing on site, an Arboriculture Method Statement (developed in accordance with the British Standard BS 5837:2005) shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval in writing. This report shall provide the following details:
- Method of excavations including machinery/hand digging; and
- Excavation depth and extent; 
- and shall take into consideration the details of the structural method statement (as required under the listed building consent)

All works shall be undertaken in accordance with the approved details. 

REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees, and to ensure a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and retained.
